LanguageData.VFM_Burst_Tent_Graph_Label: X: Base Burst Count | Y: Multiplier
LanguageData.VFM_Burst_Adaptive_Graph_Label: X: Base Burst Count | Y: Bonus Efficiency
LanguageData.VFM_EnableAutoSelection_Player_Label: Enable automatic fire mode selection for player-controlled pawns
LanguageData.VFM_EnableAutoSelection_Player_Desc: When enabled, an automatic fire mode selection button will be available. If you do not need this feature and prefer to keep the command bar less cluttered, you can disable it.
LanguageData.VFM_EnableAutoSelection_NPC_Label: Enable automatic fire mode selection for NPCs
LanguageData.VFM_EnableAutoSelection_NPC_Desc: When enabled, NPCs will automatically select fire modes based on target distance.
LanguageData.VFM_AutoSelectionThresholds_Label: Automatic Fire Mode Selection Distance Thresholds
LanguageData.VFM_Burst_Min_Distance: Minimum Distance for Short Burst Mode
